text.#text: On the acquisition of land by the

the acquired land
			 shall be added to Vicksburg National Military Park;

the boundary of
			 the Vicksburg National Military Park shall be adjusted to reflect the
			 acquisition of the land; and

the acquired land
			 shall be administered as part of the Vicksburg National Military Park in
			 accordance with applicable laws (including regulations).

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: There are authorized to be appropriated

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the acquisition of core battlefield land at
		  Champion Hill, Port Gibson, and Raymond for addition to Vicksburg National
		  Military Park.
